entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , La Scie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:43 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Scie 10:30 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -2.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -2.5°C
Wind: SE 33 km/h gust 56 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Freezing rain or snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets changing to freezing rain near noon then to rain this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 80. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then clearing. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming southwest 20 this evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022
